channel.title: Need help with amke your own minigame!
channel.description: hi, i'm just follow the tut of make your own mninigame but i dont know how to let the last monsters (jad) drop a key and make a chest for the key and then pll get some godsword and then they teleport somewhere can anyone help me plz?
